statementlist.statement: insert into book_copy_status (book_copy_id, statusdate, evidence, username, borrowername, mark, picture_filenames, event) values (:book_copy_id, :statusdate, :evidence, :username, :borrowername, :mark, :picture_filenames, :event)

select book_copy_status.* from book_copy_status join book_copy on book_copy_status.book_copy_id = book_copy.id join book on book_copy.book_id = book.id where book_copy.barcode = :barcode and book.school_id = :school_id
